samples.question: When do families celebrate together in your country?
samples.transcript: We celebrate both Christmas and Chinese New Year. So these, two public events, are the most important for our family. and I am so excited that I am going to celebrate with them in the next couple of weeks, soon. In, in Chinese New Year, we call this 2024 as a Dragon Year.
samples.transcript_original: Um, we celebrate both Christmas and Chinese New Year. So these, um, two public events, um, are the most important for our family. Um, and I'm so excited that I'm going to celebrate with them in the next couple of weeks, um, soon. In, in Chinese New Year, we call this 2024 as a Dragon Year.
samples.transcript_cleaned: We celebrate both Christmas and Chinese New Year. So these, two public events, are the most important for our family. and I am so excited that I am going to celebrate with them in the next couple of weeks, soon. In, in Chinese New Year, we call this 2024 as a Dragon Year.

samples.question: So you are seeing a change in the culture, are you, from before to now?
samples.transcript: Yes, definitely. More and more people nowadays are suffering from cost of living pressures, especially after COVID-19 pandemics, where everyone tried to focus to get more money. As according to ABC News, also the younger generation born in the year 90s are struggling financially more than the previous generation. I think because of this reason, we tend to spend more time to work rather than, have a quality time with family or friends. Here, I think Tim could have used a signal phrase at the beginning of his answer to show why he is talking about money issues. For example, he could have said, Tim said, Yes, definitely. I think one factor is that more and more people nowadays are suffering from cost of living pressures. By adding that phrase, I think one factor is that he could show that he is giving a reason for his opinion. So we would know why he is talking about financial pressures, and we would be able to follow his answer more easily. Also, the way Tim introduces his information from the news is quite formal. According to ABC News Australia. This is something you might write in an essay, but it is less common to say it in a conversation. It would be more natural to say something less formal like, I saw in the news recently that, let us now watch the end of this speaking test. let us think about everyday life in families.

samples.question: Do you think it is a good thing for parents to help their children with their schoolwork?
samples.transcript: I believe so. I think, home education is the best education as, children can have a motivation from their parents and also can gain an insight of what is the purpose of doing something. like I mentioned previously, I love reading historical books because of my dad. He influenced me a lot when I was a kid.
samples.transcript_original: Um, I believe so. I think, uh, home education is the best education as, um, children can have a motivation from their parents and also can gain an insight of what is the purpose of doing something. Um, like I mentioned previously, I love reading historical books because of my dad. He influenced me a lot when I was a kid.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I believe so. I think, home education is the best education as, children can have a motivation from their parents and also can gain an insight of what is the purpose of doing something. like I mentioned previously, I love reading historical books because of my dad. He influenced me a lot when I was a kid.

samples.question: How important is it for families to eat together at least once a day?

samples.question: However, all of the things which I get from my father and also some of my family members who gave it.
samples.transcript: However, today I would like to talk about a time, when I get a stuff which is really important for me and which was given by my sister. It was a mobile phone. I got it on my 17th birthday. it was really important for me because I have to, join my online classes on the time there was a COVID-19 situation for that. all of my, classes are off. And for that, my teachers pay for me to draw a mobile phone to, to join my online classes. And from the first time when I told to my father that I really want a mobile phone for my education, my father, understand that is really important, but he, on the time we have some problem in our family for that he, are not, he is not able to provide me this. And when my sisters listen to that, which is, my mobile phone is important. He did not tell me that he is going to give it to me.
